title: At least 62 people killed in crane accident at Mecca’s Grand Mosque
content:
At least 62 people were killed when a crane crashed into Mecca’s Grand Mosque on Friday, Saudi Arabia’s civil defence authority said on its Twitter account, an accident that came just weeks before the Muslim annual haj pilgrimage.
